data.name: SAMURAI WARRIORS 4-II
data.detailed_description:
판매 종료 안내

평소KOEI TECMO GAMES의 제품을 이용해 주셔서 대단히 감사합니다.
　기존에 Steam상에서 본 타이틀을 판매하였으나, 여러 가지 사정으로 인하여 2022년4월11일을 마지막으로 순차 판매를 종료하게 되었습니다.

　■판매 종료 개시 예정일：2022년4월11일

이용해 주신 고객님들께 큰 불편을 끼쳐드려 죄송합니다. 아무쪼록 이해해 주시기를 부탁드립니다. 또한 이미 구입을 완료하신 고객분들에 대해서는 본편 플레이 및 DLC의 구입・플레이는 지속해서 가능하오니 계속해서 즐겨 주셨으면 합니다.
앞으로도 KOEI TECMO GAMES의 제품을 사랑해 주시기를 부탁드립니다.
　또한 문의사항이 있으시면 아래의 연락처로 문의해 주시기 바랍니다.

＜고객 서비스・문의처＞
Digital Touch
TEL: 02-706-1686
FAX: 02-706-1687
e-mail：master@digital-touch.co.kr

이상


The truly ultimate "WARRIORS OROCHI 3" is now available on Steam!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1879330/


About the Game

The last title released for the tenth anniversary of the "SAMURAI WARRIORS" series, "SAMURAI WARRIORS 4-II", is here at last!
Naomasa Ii appears as a playable character for the first time, and the various personalities of the age are explored in more depth in "Story Mode", which is now focused on individual characters.
Series favorite "Survival Mode" returns as well, powered up from its previous iterations.
The most well-received elements of "SAMURAI WARRIORS 4" are carried over, while the action balance, cut-scenes and character development systems have all been significantly upgraded. Explore the world of "SAMURAI WARRIORS 4" anew, in this whole new take on the title!

* The images are from an in-development build and may differ from the final version.

data.short_description: The latest iteration of the 10th anniversary "SAMURAI WARRIORS" series is here at last! Naomasa Ii appears as a playable character for the first time, and the various personalities of the age are explored in more depth in "Story Mode", which is now focused on individual characters.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 8, Windows® 8.1
  • Processor: Core2 DUO 2.4GHz or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 640*480 pixel over, High Color
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 11 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c over
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 8, Windows® 8.1
  • Processor: Core i7 860 better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280*720 pixel over, True Color
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 11 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c over
